entry.title: MH-7 (pali hats)
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Felted Hats
Price: 16.00

A gorgeous piece of art - A 100% handmade hat in a gorgeous colour, elegant, classics and prefect casual hat guaranteed to transform everyday and occasions wardrobe. This hat is created from merino wool by felting so it makes it is warm and cosy for cold and harsh winters as well as good for fall/autumn winds.

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material.
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover.
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.


Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.

entry.title: Star Cone Hats
entry.summary:
Vendor: Hamro Village
Type: Felted Hats
Price: 12.00

A gorgeous piece of art - it will emphasize your individuality! Fun and adorable perfect accessory for all. These felted hat are made using all natural products - 100% merino wool, water and olive oil soap, using wet felting technique.

composition: 100% felted wool, a renewable material.
care: spot-clean with damp sponge and soap, or with a textile stain remover.
Do not machine wash. Do not iron. Do not bleach.



Please be aware that actual colors may differ slightly from their appearance on your display, as it depends on your monitor settings.|
